span.strong: INSTRUCTIONS FOR FILING DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS AND DEFINITIONS – 2012

p.span: Requirements concerning the filing of this form are found in N.J.S.A. 18A:12-21 et seq.
* Personal Disclosure statements for fiscal year 2011 to be filed by the Board Secretary to the Executive County Superintendent’s office by April 30, 2012.

br.span: * February 27, 2012 is the last day to submit petition to run for a seat on the board of education.
* 2012 NJ School Boards Association Candidate Kits are available online or see the business administrator.

span.a: Please click here to read the complete document.

div.i:
This institution is an equal opportunity provider.
Admin Login
